name: forget me not (sleepily)
description:
Install instructions

Controls:

A/D - Move
W - Jump
E - Character Ability
S - Depression's Jetpack Ability
F - Fuse Characters

Esc - Main Menu
R - Retry

Additional Playtest Controls:
N - Skip Level Backward
M - Skip Level Forward

Please use this form to tell us what you think about the game.
We'd also appreciate if you report Bugs via this form.

Thank you for testing our game!
